high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to face the left side of the toilet.
Pick the toilet paper roll up from the back of the toilet.
Turn to the left and face the toilet paper holder on the wall.
Put the toilet paper on the holder on the wall.
anns.task_desc: Put toilet paper from the back of a toilet on the holder on the wall.

high_descs: turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the right and go to the wall and turn to the right facing the toilet
pick up the toilet paper from the toilet tank
turn to the left facing the toilet paper holder
put the toilet paper on the toilet paper holder
anns.task_desc: Place toilet paper on the toilet paper holder

high_descs: Turn around, take a few steps to the toilet
Take the roll of toilet paper from the toilet
Put the roll of toilet paper on the roll
anns.task_desc: Put the roll of toilet paper on the holder
